channel.title: Wndows 7 disconnection?
channel.description:
I just bought a new computer with windows 7 last week. When I run my server on it, logg in, and press twice realy fast, it disconnects me and closes. It doesnt do that on my old computer so i dont know what's wrong. any help?
ps. my server source is delta 317

item.title: Wndows 7 disconnection?
item.dc:creator: @power_of_the_blood power of the blood
item.description:
@power_of_the_blood wrote:

Downloaded and installed the file from the link you provided and still have the same problem. help please?

can somebody please help?

Read full topic

item.title: Wndows 7 disconnection?
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

Gsempire:

You need to change the run.bat to run.exe on the client, you can download a converter somewhere.

No… You do not have to do that.

It is most likely your using a 64 bit Java, you need to download a 32 bit JDK Java.

https://cds.sun.com/is-bin/INTERSHOP.enfinity/WFS/CDS-CDS_SMI-Site/en_US/-/USD/ViewProductDetail-Start?ProductRef=java_ee_sdk-6u1-wjdk-oth-JPR%40CDS-CDS_SMI

Just choose the 32 bit one and use Windows 7.

Read full topic

item.title: Wndows 7 disconnection?
item.dc:creator: @power_of_the_blood power of the blood
item.description:
@power_of_the_blood wrote:

umm, i edited the file and saved it as run.exe, but it said it was not compatible and that i should check to see if i need an 86bit or 32bit. sorry if i sound nooby but i’m new lol

Read full topic
